definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: The soldiers of Baker Company , 31st Infantry, would be in reserve.
sentences.chinese: 陸軍31步兵團的B連被留作爲預備隊。

sentences.english: Japanese Army 16th Division Infantry troops climb up the walls near Zhongshan Gate.
sentences.chinese: 日軍第十六師團步兵攀上中山門。

sentences.english: Waldo is with the 27th Infantry Regiment.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾多是第27步兵團的士兵。

sentences.english: The army pinned  the enemy to its ground by powerful infantry attacks.
sentences.chinese: 部隊以強大的步兵進攻來牽制敵人使其不能離開。

sentences.english: This was the epoch when a National Guardsman fought like a Zouave.
sentences.chinese: 在那個時代國民自衛軍打起仗來就象輕步兵一樣。

sentences.english: You ever served in an infantry unit, son?
sentences.chinese: 你曾在步兵團服過役嗎，小子？

sentences.english: With the move from manoeuvre to trench warfare, both the infantry and the artillery had to learn how to work together.
sentences.chinese: 由演習過渡到陣地戰，步兵和炮兵也需學會協同作戰。

sentences.english: Several regiments of Russian infantry surged up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 幾個團的蘇軍步兵向山上衝鋒。

sentences.english: Devastators should be used to decimate infantry and attack units at very long ranges.
sentences.chinese: 毀滅戰艦應該被用於遠距離大批屠殺步兵和攻擊單位。

sentences.english: The interim answer was to equip the harder-to-hit infantry with armor-piercing weaponry.
sentences.chinese: 臨時的應對方案是爲不易被擊中的步兵裝備穿甲武器。

sentences.english: Only effective against infantry in melee combat.
sentences.chinese: 只有防止互毆戰鬥的步兵有效的。

sentences.english: Twinblades no longer fire their missiles at infantry.
sentences.chinese: 雙刃不再對步兵使用火箭彈攻擊。

sentences.english: Separate mechanized divisions and tank battalions for infantry divisions were also formed.
sentences.chinese: 同時獨立的機械化師和步兵師屬坦克營也開始組建。

sentences.english: Panzer Elite Infantry Halftrack health reduced from 300 to 285.
sentences.chinese: 裝甲精英步兵半履帶車生命由300降低至285。

sentences.english: The slaughter was very great; Israel lost thirty thousand foot soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 被殺的人甚多，以色列的步兵仆倒了三萬。

sentences.english: When transformed into walking mode, the launchers are angled for antipersonnel use.
sentences.chinese: 當變爲行走模式時，發射器則轉爲反步兵。
